rules_text:
[+1]: Draw two cards, then sacrifice a permanent.
[-2]: Create a token that's a copy of Yusi's back face.
[-3]: Target opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card in that player's hand or graveyard, then exile it. You may cast it without paying its mana cost.
